title: Chat ban for no reason
body: so i was playing league today and after playing a game got a chat ban. I have no reason why i played 1 game and i was ashe.. got off for a bit and come back with a chat ban... no warning no nothing just banned please fix this

replies.body:
You should have received an email with your reform card (telling you why you received the restriction with relevant chat logs) in it, try checking your spam folder if you can't find it.

If you still can't find the email, or don't have access to the email associated with your account, [submit a support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they will be able to get you your reform card/help you change your email.

I just checked my email and it shows a game that i never even played.. i played 1 ashe game then got off then played another game where i had ban. no in between or anything so i dont understand how i could be banned. my match history doesnt show the game where i was "abusive"... thanks rito
Submit a support ticket, they will be able to help you.
